job_details.degree_required: Degree in information technology, business, finance, or a related field

jd: From: Lokesh, GSK SOLUTIONS INC lokesh@gsksolutions.com Reply to: lokesh@gsksolutions.com Job Title: Senior IT Project Manager (Hybrid)Location: Indianapolis, INDuration: 12+ MonthsJob Type: Corp-Corp / 1099 / Contract W2 Interview Type: WebcamClient: State of IndianaNote: Local candidates are required for the position Job Description: Responsible for relationship management, project planning, resource management, tactical execution, and the creation and / or oversight of final project deliverablesCollaborate with senior management, stakeholders, and the team to meet business objectives and provide professional leadership & mentorship fostering respect and trust to inspire others to pursue excellence.Review, revise, and implement policies, practices, standards, and tools that support IOT project effortsWork directly with senior managers and staff supporting all facets of IOT’s service deliveryJob Requirements:5 years Project management experience OR Associate’s Degree and four years of project management experience.Certification as a Project Management Professional by the Project Management Institute or similar professional designation preferred.Extensive experience overseeing multiple projects to successful conclusionExperience with technology projects using various development methodologies, including agile and waterfall SDLCsAbility to manage projects of relative high complexity and dollar valueDemonstrated capacity to maintain tact, diplomacy, and mindfulness in engagement with highly visible and highly demanding stakeholders at a variety of levelsStrong knowledge of, and documented experience with, exceptional delivery of products and services to a wide range of users, with an emphasis on (but not restricted to) successful delivery in one or more level of governmentAbility to handle multiple high-visibility, high-priority initiatives effectively, independently, and under competing constraintExceptional professional presence, including the strong ability to communicate publicly to a variety of audiencesDevelop, monitor, and maintain project plansAbility to establish and manage project budget with the understanding of all financial implications/issuesCoordinate and monitor activities of all stakeholders to ensure timelines and budgets are metCommunicate project status to management and project stakeholdersAble to perform more varied and difficult tasksAble to work in a collaborative team environment to obtain best resultsAbility to delegate work, set clear direction, and manage workflowAbility to effectively give feedback, provide guidance or corrective action, coach, and develop employee skillsets Work is broad in scope requiring extensive judgment in adopting techniques to meet the information technology requirements, specifications, standards, and procedures of a complex enterprise-wide system. Work requires attention to detail and understanding of the impact that IT service delivery has across not only the Executive Branch, but also the State of Indiana broadly. As the backbone of the State’s IT operations, IOT’s efforts have a direct, critical role in facilitating government services from agencies to the citizenry. This position carries both high visibility and high expectations, requiring exceptional knowledge, and relationship building. The selected candidate will be counted upon to be an exceptional representative of IOT to stakeholders at all levels, at all times.This position will work closely with individuals representing all levels of IOT, including senior managers, subject matter experts, and agency personnel, consultants, contractors, and other key stakeholders as needed Skill Matrix SkillRequired / DesiredAmountof ExperienceExperience as a strategic planner, program / portfolio manager, or project managerRequired5YearsExperience with technology projects using various development methodologies, including agile and waterfall SDLCsRequired5YearsExtensive experience overseeing multiple projects to successful conclusionRequired5YearsExperience managing projects of relative high complexity and dollar valueRequired5YearsExperience developing, monitoring, and maintaining project plansRequired5YearsAbility to establish and manage project budget with the understanding of all financial implications/issuesRequired5YearsCoordinate and monitor activities of all stakeholders to ensure timelines and budgets are metRequired5YearsAbility to delegate work, set clear direction, and manage workflowRequired5YearsAbility to maintain tact, diplomacy, and mindfulness in engagement with highly visible and highly demanding stakeholders at a variety of levelsRequired Creative, Strategic team playerRequired Ability to handle multiple high-visibility, high-priority initiatives effectively, independently, and under competing constraintsRequired Exceptional professional presence, including the strong ability to communicate publicly to a variety of audiencesRequired Degree in information technology, business, finance, or a related fieldRequired PMP CertifiedHighly desired
